name: Childcare Services
description: Choose full- or part-time care in a safe, nurturing space where skilled teachers balance care, learning, and growth every day! - Ages: 18 months to 6 years - Open hours: 6:30 AM to 6:00 PM, M-F - A white zone in front of our center for easy parking at pick-up and drop-off. - Provides morning snack, lunch and afternoon snack.
